fields.name: Meir Juli
fields.summary: About three years of experience in various development environments. Experience in start-up companies. Full stack developer. I'm Backend oriented. Experience: JS 3 years', React & Nodejs: 2.5 years' and 1 year in Google play store

experience.title: FULL STACK DEVELOPER
experience.description: Development of a website and application starting from scratch until the packaging of the product and its delivery to customers. I was involved in company decisions about the system architecture (such as: the flow of data, data storage, applying 'SOLID' principles). Agile development. Development in the following technologies: Frontend: React. Backend: Nest (using typeorm). Db: MySql + Mongodb. Cloud: Azure.

experience.title: FULL STACK WEB DEVELOPER
experience.description: Website development for an independent business, serving families of terminally ill patients. Development in the following technologies: Frontend: Angular, Backend: Nodejs (exprees.js) db: mongo

education.degree: FULL STACK DEVELOPER CERTIFICATE IN WEB TECHNOLOGIES AND APPLICATIONS

skills.linux: Intermediate knowledge, familiar with common commands.
